Assignement
========================================================

This repository includes run_analysis.R (Rscript) and a codebook.pdf describing variables in the data set created by the script.

Original data can be obtained at https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip


R script reads different files with data, combines them, cleanes them and creates datacleaned with 10299 observations adn 68 variables as well as dataaverages with 180 observations and 68 variables

codebook.pdf provids descriptions for each variable
